personal.name: Manolo Malloleche

personal.bio: Alex is a results-driven software engineering manager with over a decade of experience leading cross-functional teams and delivering enterprise-grade applications. Passionate about mentoring engineers and fostering collaborative environments to drive innovation and impact.
